name: Podio LL Cards Hover Height Max
description:
Cards get full height on hover.

Note: Only makes sense if you have active style which limits card height!
additional_info:
1) Requires "Podio: Lots and lots of misc tweaks" by "Luke Abell".
https://userstyles.org/styles/99429/podio-lots-and-lots-of-misc-tweaks
2) Requires the base style "Podio LL Cards" by "LabersLab"
https://userstyles.org/styles/107422/podio-ll-cards
3) There are further additions to the base style, i.e. "Podio LL Cards Height 1em", or this very style "Podio LL Cards Hover Height Max".
